name: Laser and Punch
description:
Made for the Juice Jam 2022 in one week!

Arachnophobia Warning!

(Also has bugs, the code kind)

Make your way through a swamp equipped with boxing gloves and a laser. Defeat your foes and finally escape!

Controls: 

WASD - move, SPACE -Jump, SHIFT- Sprint

Mouse Left - LeftPunch & Laser, Mouse Right - RightPunch,
